WHOUS.name: Forest entrance
WHOUS.desc:
You are standing before the forest which surrounds the necromancer's keep.
Despite the towering trees, the necromancer's fortress eclipses them all.
WHOUS.look: The trees sway in the chilling wind. There's only one way forward; unless you're a coward I guess.

pamphlet.look: There is a pamphlet laying on the ground.

FOREST1.name: Unassuming log
FOREST1.desc: You happen upon an unassuming log in the forest.
FOREST1.look: There's an unassuming log here. A large spider used to live here.

search.text: You don't find anything interesting in the log.

log.take: The log is much, much too large to take.

BRIDGE.name: Rickety bridge
BRIDGE.desc: You encounter a river, with only a rickety bridge to cross it.

bridge.look: A rickety bridge. It's surprisingly sturdy despite being called "rickety bridge".
bridge.take: Listen, I know you *really* want take this bridge with you, but you can't. It's public property.

GOBLIN_CAMP.name: Goblin camp
GOBLIN_CAMP.look: A simple goblin camp with a single tent.
GOBLIN_CAMP.desc: It appears some goblins had set up camp here; there's a tent and a campfire.
GOBLIN_CAMP.desc-post-combat: This camp used to belong to some goblins.

search.true: You don't find anything else of note in the tent.
false: You found a potion inside the goblins' tent and take it. Nice!

tent.look: A couple goblins set up a small tent here.
tent.take: This isn't a hiking trip, there's no reason to take a tent.

campfire.search: There's nothing remaining in the campfire except for a few ashes.
campfire.look: A campfire. It used to be lit at some point.
campfire.take: You pick up some ashes, but they slip through your fingers.
campfire.open: The campfire is already out in the open.

desc.true:
You find yourself in front of a small, slightly decrepit shack.
The windows are boarded up and the front door is slightly ajar.
desc.false:
You find yourself in front of a small, slightly decrepit shack.
The windows are boarded up and the front door is closed.

false: You open the door. Smart thinking!

door.take: The door is "securely" fastened onto the rusty hinges.
door.search:
You carefully search the door. Many hundreds of termites appear to have taken up
a cozy residence here.

look.true: There's a small shack. It's front door is slightly ajar.
look.false: There's a small shack. It's front door is closed.

exits.fail-text:
You try to walk into the shack, but end up walking straight into the door.
Maybe trying to enter a closed door was not a good idea.
